Hi everyone, I've been working on this spreadsheet for a long time now and now have gotten to a point where others might get interested. I'd like to set up a download soon, but all I've got at the moment is a Google Docs link. Please give some feedback so I know what to fix. Thanks Forums!

-Desmond_Kerman

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vCkN4p4eKEYFcqX8GIheej8jHllbvGoW-uer3R25ozE/edit?usp=docslist_api

Nice sheet!

If you had multiple pages based on that one, you could have one for each stage, adding the delta-V from each to get a multistage total.
